problem.title: Why Marketing Agencies Are Leaving Legacy Reporting Tools
problem.p1: For over a decade, marketing reporting has been stuck in the past. Tools like Excel and early dashboards were revolutionary in 2010, but in 2026, they are bottlenecks. Slow loading times, manual data entry, and broken API connectors are costing agencies thousands of billable hours every year.
problem.p2: Modern agencies need speed. Waiting 30 seconds for a report to load during a client presentation is no longer acceptable. Clients expect real-time access, interactive data, and mobile-ready designs that look as professional as the campaigns you run for them.

solution.title: What Defines a Modern Reporting Platform in 2026?
solution.intro: When evaluating alternatives to Looker Studio or other legacy tools, look for these three critical capabilities:
solution.point1Desc: Pre-fetched data architecture that eliminates loading spinners completely.
solution.point2Desc: Automated text summaries that explain the 'why' behind the metrics, not just the 'what'.
solution.point3Desc: Interfaces designed for storytelling, not just data dumping. Think 'slides' rather than 'spreadsheets'.

faq.a3: Yes. Every part of the experience can be branded, from colors to logos. Your clients will never see Flipika's branding.

faq.q1: Can I import my existing Looker Studio dashboards?
faq.a1: Not directly, as Looker Studio and Flipika use different architectures. However, our team can help you recreate your most important dashboards in Flipika in less than 24h. Good news: most of our customers find that Flipika templates already meet 80% of their needs.
faq.q2: Is Flipika really faster than Looker Studio?
faq.a2: Yes, significantly. Looker Studio queries the Google Ads API on every load, which takes 10-30 seconds. Flipika pre-calculates your metrics and uses an optimized architecture that loads your reports in under a second, even with millions of data rows.
faq.a3: Absolutely. Flipika is hosted on Google Cloud (same servers as Google Ads), uses SSL/TLS encryption, and is GDPR compliant. Your data is stored in Europe and never shared with third parties. We have the same security standards as online banks.
faq.q4: Can I customize reports to my brand?
faq.a4: Yes, completely. You can upload your logo, define your brand colors, and customize displayed metrics. White label is included in all plans.
faq.a5: Our team supports you for free. Send us your current Looker Studio dashboard links, we analyze them, and create the equivalents in Flipika. Typical migration: 1-2 days for 10-20 dashboards. You validate, and we launch.
faq.q6: What happens if Google Ads changes their API?
faq.a6: Unlike Looker Studio where you have to manually reconfigure everything, Flipika automatically handles Google Ads API changes. Our technical team maintains the connectors up to date, you don't have to do anything. Zero downtime, zero worries.
faq.q7: Can I try Flipika without commitment?
faq.a7: Yes, 100%. All our plans include a 14-day free trial, no credit card required. You can create as many reports as you want during the trial. If it doesn't suit you, no problem, cancel with one click.
faq.q8: Does Flipika work with Google Analytics and Facebook Ads?
faq.a8: Flipika is currently specialized in Google Ads to offer the best possible experience. Google Analytics 4 and Meta Ads integrations are in development and will launch in Q2 2026. Subscribe to our newsletter to be notified of the launch.
